REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f4044 reute u f BC-THAI-M-1-MONEY-SUPPLY 03-17 0086

TEXT.TITLE: THAI M-1 MONEY SUPPLY RISES IN JANUARY
TEXT.BODY: Thailand's M-1 money supply rose 9.8 pct to an estimated 117.3 billion baht in January after increasing 6.6 pct in December, the Bank of Thailand said. It said year-on-year M-1 grew 23.1 pct in January after an 18.5 pct increase in December. The central bank said M-2 rose 1.7 pct to an estimated 686.5 billion baht in January after a 2.4 pct increase in December while year-on-year it expanded 13.3 pct after a 12.6 pct rise in December. REUTER
